title: 825. Marcus Freeman on Notre Dame's Identity & Relationships with Players
itunes:title: 825. Marcus Freeman on Notre Dame's Identity & Relationships with Players
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode of Move the Sticks. Throughout the episode, they're joined by Notre Dame head football coach Marcus Freeman as he discusses what it's like being the new head coach, the development of players, relationships with players, his past coaching experiences, and much more.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
